name: Lexond: Boss fight
description:
PLAY IN FULLSCREEN!!!

OR DOWNLOAD GAME

If you do not play in full screen mode, part of the interface is distorted!

Kill the boss using your superpowers!

Right mouse click - switch superpower.

wasd-move.

Have a good game!

This game I made for the "GeoJam" jam in 3 days.
